title: The Three Chocolatiers
overview: This series follows Teri Abelson and her two grown daughters, Jennifer and Carrie at the family owned business. A new reality television series that takes you inside the family business at the renowned Beverly Hills chocolate shop, Generations of Lee Gelfond in Beverly Hills. The raucous, bickering family are masters when it comes to made-to-order chocolate pieces. From creating a life-sized replica of a guitar for a rock â€˜n' roll mama's rock star son, Les Paul to a gorgeous chocolate "sushi" platter, it's all just another day's work at the family business.
